documents.document: @pameladruck Hi Pamela, Alex here on Newstalk Radio, Ireland. Could you DM/tweet me about possible interview RE: parenting in France? Thanks

@TScorpio absolutely true. plus, they haven't said Ireland will get €13bn have they? just that Apple owe the money to someone.
@TScorpio i agree. i just don't think they'll get this past Joe Public. the figure is too big. even if they are somehow justified.
